meanings.sent1: The vegetables were boilable and cooked quickly in the hot water.
meanings.sent2: The eggs were boilable, so I placed them in the pot to make hard-boiled eggs.
meanings.sent3: The soup was so boilable that it practically jumped out of the pot!
meanings.sent4: Her anger was like a boilable pot of water, ready to bubble over at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The fabric was so boilable that it shrunk in the wash, becoming a tiny shirt.

meanings.sent1: The boilable pot was perfect for making pasta on the stove.
meanings.sent2: The boilable vegetables retained their nutrients when cooked in water.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a boilable phone case seemed strange but practical.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a boilable fountain, bubbling up joyfully.
meanings.sent5: The boilable material of the container made it safe to use in the microwave.
